org.jivesoftware.smackx.time.packet

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jivesoftware.smack.packet.Stanza
      • org.jivesoftware.smack.packet.IQ
        • org.jivesoftware.smackx.time.packet.Time
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jivesoftware.smack.packet.Element, org.jivesoftware.smack.packet.Packet, org.jivesoftware.smack.packet.TopLevelStreamElement

    public class Time
extends org.jivesoftware.smack.packet.IQ
    A Time IQ packet, which is used by XMPP clients to exchange their respective local times. Clients that wish to fully support the entity time protocol should register a PacketListener for incoming time requests that then respond with the local time.
    See Also:
    XEP-202
